Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Happy New Year to you! Please don’t forget to sign up your children for the following fantastic sports programmes the school is offering this term!
BSKL GYMNASTICS PROGRAMME Directed by Miss Marwood, the programme will run over 8 weeks and the cost is RM 300 per student. It is available to students in Years 1 – 4. Full details of the programme, including how to register can be found by following the link below:
BSKL Gymnastics Flyer
Should you have any questions please contact Miss Marwood on: annalicia.marwood@britishschool.edu.my BSKL BASKETBALL SKILLS PROGRAMME Coached by Mr. Daniel Dean and Ms. Grace McElwaine, the programme will run over 8 weeks and the cost is RM 300 per student. It is available to students in Years 4 – 8. Club Flyer Full details of the programme, including how to register can be found by following the link below: Basketball Skills Club Should you have any questions please contact Daniel or Grace on: daniel.dean@britishschool.edu.my grace.mcelwaine@britishschool.edu.my BSKL RUGBY DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME
Coached by Mr. Johnson, Mr. Thomson, Mr Jones and Mr. Allday, the programme will run over 7 weeks and the cost is RM 250 per student. It is available to students in Years 1 – 8.
Full details of the programme can be found by following the link below: Rugby Development Programme To register, kindly fill in the application form through the below link: Rugby Registration Form Should you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact Harrie Thomson our Head of PE on:
harrie.thomson@britishschool.edu.my BSKL FOOTBALL PROGRAMME Coached by Mr. Thomson, Mr. Finch, and Mr. Burton the programme will run over 8 weeks and the cost is RM 300 per student. It is available to students in Years 1 – 8. Full details of the programme can be found by following the link below: Football Programme To register, kindly fill in the application form through the below link.
Registration Form
Should you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact Harrie Thomson our Head of PE on: harrie.thomson@britishschool.edu.my BSKL DANCE PROGRAMME Presented by Ms. Sabrina Saw and running over 7 weeks the cost per student is RM 350. It is available to students in Years 3 – 8. Parents can also get involved should you wish! Sabrina takes our very popular ASA dance workshop and furthermore the school is partnering Sabrina with Pet Project 2013. More details regarding the workshop and Pet Project 2013 can be found by clicking on the below link:
Swagilicious Saturdays
